title: Introducing Canonball
itunes:author: UW-Green Bay Psychology Department
itunes:summary: In this special preview episode, Chuck and Ryan introduce the Canonball podcast, where they'll talk about "the canon" and plans for the show going forward. Future episodes will include discussions with experts on "great works" from literature, to paintings, to video games, to film, and more. Check back soon for full episodes!
itunes:subtitle: In this special preview episode, Chuck and Ryan iâ€¦
